CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and LUMO energy levels are estimated to be -5.40 eV and -3.70 eV , respectively , using the ferrocene - ferrocenium ( Fc / Fc+ ) redox couple ( 4.8 eV below the vacuum level ).

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ferrocene |
| ferrocenium |

The words "Fc" in the paragraph refer to the material name "ferrocene", and "Fc+" refer to the material name "ferrocenium".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I confirm that the only valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" are:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ferrocene |
| ferrocenium |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "HOMO", "LUMO", "vacuum level", and "redox couple" do not refer to material names.

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO and LUMO energy levels are estimated to be -5.40 eV and -3.70 eV , respectively , using the ferrocene - ferrocenium ( Fc / Fc+ ) redox couple ( 4.8 eV below the vacuum level ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -5.40 eV |
| -3.70 eV |
| 4.8 eV |

The other entities, "HOMO", "LUMO", "energy levels", "ferrocene - ferrocenium (Fc / Fc+) redox couple", and "vacuum level" are not "Value of material property" entities. They are either names of concepts or units of measurement.
